SYSTEM: Semantic_Integration_Sensor_Networks_%28short_overview%29.pdf: Página 10
Architecture
Semantic Integrator 
provides data access to an 
integrated virtual resource 
that integrates:
• Streaming data sources
• Stored data sources
It provides a unified 
ontological view 
accessible through 
declarative queries.

Semantic Integration Streaming Data Sources
